channel.title: CGA Institute on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Libraries

item.title: GIS @ Harvard Libraries
item.description: Classes GSD: Spatial Analysis Fall 2021 presentation . Map created by GSD students Aeshna Prasad, Michael Lidwin, Megan Mcglinchey, and Mehvish Jamal working with the Map Collection. Data management OldNYC: Mapping Historic Photographs at the NYPL . 1880 census from Archive.org . ArcGIS Map comparing 1890 atlas to today. Global volcanoes dataset in the Harvard Geospatial Library (HGL). Research Record from Harvard Map Collection card catalog . Services and Resources The Harvard Map Collection maintains a series of tutorials, guides, and updates about mapmaking.
